header.name: chaos/preprocessor/facilities/split.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that extracts an element from a binary .

macro.abstract: The macro extracts an element from a binary .

usage.param: The index of the element to be extracted. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The from which an element is to be extracted. This must expand to at least two elements.
The index of the element to be extracted. Valid values are 0 and 1.
The from which an element is to be extracted. This must expand to two elements.

macro.para: If i is 0, this macro expands to the first element of im or __VA_ARGS__. Otherwise, it expands to the second element of im or the elements after the first in __VA_ARGS__.
macro.listing:
#include #include
#define A() p, q
(0, A()) // p (1, A()) // q
#if
#define B() x, y, z
(0, B()) // x (1, B()) // y, z
#endif
